title: Vlastimil Opálek
text:
Vlastimil Opálek (born 7 February 1959 in <a href="Trnava">Trnava</a> - died 5 October 1995) was a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> goalkeeper.
Career.
Opálek played as a goalkeeper for <a href="FC%20Spartak%20Trnava">FC Spartak Trnava</a>. After retiring from playing, he became a goalkeeping coach for Spartak at age 35.
Personal.
Opálek died in a traffic accident in <a href="Drnovice%20%28Vy%C5%A1kov%20District%29">Drnovice</a> at age 36.
